QuestData.Title: Lead By Example
QuestData.Description:
Margrave Krexus expects much of you, mortal. Show these soldiers how a true champion of the arena vanquishes their foes and claims victory!
Meet these traitorous constructs head on. Leave none standing!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Steelskin Vanguard or Steelskin Brutalizers.
QuestData.RewardText: That should strike fear into their stolen hearts.
